other_tests.findings: Eosinophilic spongiform edema of the lesioned skin, eosinophilic microabscesses in the focal epidermis, liquefaction of the basal layer, and eosinophilic infiltration in the superficial dermis.

Diffuse multiple cystic and lamellar abnormal signal areas in the left frontal and parietal lobes, with low signal in T1-weighted imaging and high signal in T2-weighted imaging, with speckled diffusion restriction within the lesion.

Diffuse hypodensity in the left cerebral hemisphere and bilateral cerebellum, with a large patchy hypodense area in the left frontoparietal lobe and multiple speckled hyperintensities within it, as well as a widened left ventricle and additional patchy hyperintensities in the left cerebellar hemisphere.

other_tests.procedure_name: Chromosomal copy number variation (CNV-Seq plus) and cytological karyotype detection
other_tests.findings: Approximately 18.29Mb mosaicism repeats in the Yp11.31q11.222 region (16%), approximately 7.83Mb mosaicism deletions in the Yq11.222q11.23 region (17%), approximately 317.54kb repeats in the Yp11.2p11.2 region, and 3p26.3p26.3 region duplication.
No pathogenic minor variants in the IKBKG gene.
No large deletion repeat variants in large segments of the IKBKG gene.
Did not find deletion variants in exons 4â€“10 of the IKBKG gene.
